data.name: AmpDefect
data.value: Action: Check if amplifier is still 'ON' (Green 230Vac and/or 48Vdc indicator) and not in protect mode (Yellow indicators). If not: contact your dealer. If yes: reset error and wait a few minutes; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: Com1Interface
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a failure on this line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: Com2Interface
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a failure on this line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: Dsp
data.value: Action: reset error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer. Dealer should perform a power cycle (230Vac and 48Vdc) to check if error returns.

data.name: Eeprom
data.value: Action: reset error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer. Dealer should perform a power cycle (230Vac and 48Vdc) to check if error returns.

data.name: Epc
data.value: Action: ensure the EPC battery charger does not indicate any errors. If it does, contact your dealer. If it does not; reset error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: EpcOpenline
data.value: Action: reset error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer. There is probably a connection fault between devices.

data.name: EpcShortcut
data.value: Action: reset error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer. There is probably a connection fault between devices.

data.name: Expansion
data.value: Action: reset error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: ExternAudioLine
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a short or disconnection on this line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: ExternAudioOpenline
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a short or disconnection on this line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: ExternAudioShortcut
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a short or disconnection on this line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: ExternError
data.value: Action: ensure that the ESA amplifiers do not indicate a protection mode; If they do, contact your dealer. If they don't; reset error, if error returns, contact your dealer.

data.name: ExternOpenline
data.value: Action: reset error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer. There is probably a connection fault between devices.

data.name: ExternShortcut
data.value: Action: reset error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer. There is probably a connection fault between devices.

data.name: HwWdog
data.value: Action: reset error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer. Dealer should perform a power cycle (230Vac and 48Vdc) to check if error returns.

data.name: ImpDev1KhzA
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a partial disconnected speaker or speaker line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: ImpDev1KhzB
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a partial disconnected speaker or speaker line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: ImpDev22Khz
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a partial disconnected speaker or speaker line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: MainPower230V
data.value: Action: the Entero ESC detected a 230Vac power loss. Check if all connections are ok and if other devices do not indicate 230Vac errors. Reset error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: MainsFuse
data.value: Action: ensure that the ESA amplifiers and EPC battery charger are powered from 230Vac; If not, contact your dealer. If yes; reset error, if error returns; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: MainsFuseOpenline
data.value: Action: ensure that the ESA amplifiers and EPC battery charger are powered from 230Vac; If not, contact your dealer. If yes; reset error, if error returns; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: MainsFuseShortcut
data.value: Action: reset error, if the error returns, contact your dealer. There is probably a connection fault between devices.

data.name: MicCapOpenLine
data.value: Action: make sure the cable of the Fire Mic is connected & not damaged (which can cause an open connection). Reset error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: MicCapShortcut
data.value: Action: make sure the Microphone is properly fixed to the housing and does not show any signs of damage (which can cause an internal open connection). Reset error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: MicLineBus1
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a failure on this line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: MicLineBus2
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a failure on this line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: MicRequest
data.value: Action: make sure the red Fire Mic is connected and does not show any signs of damage (which can cause a broken switch). Reset error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: Mp31
data.value: Action: reset error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer. Dealer should check if SD cards are properly inserted and do not contain corrupted files.

data.name: Mp32
data.value: Action: reset error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer. Dealer should check if SD cards are properly inserted and do not contain corrupted files.

data.name: NoBackup
data.value: Action: Check if amplifier is still 'ON' (Green 230Vac and/or 48Vdc indicator) and not in protect mode (Yellow indicators). If not: contact your dealer. If yes: reset the error and wait a few minutes; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: OpenlineA
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused an open/disconnected speaker line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: OpenlineB
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused an open/disconnected speaker line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: PanelTxIsr
data.value: Action: reset error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer. Dealer should perform a power cycle (230Vac and 48Vdc) to check if error returns.

data.name: Rs485FpBus1
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a short or disconnection on this line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: Rs485FpBus2
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a short or disconnection on this line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: Rs485MasterSlave
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a short or disconnection on this line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: ShortcutA
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a short on the speaker line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: ShortcutB
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a short on the speaker line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: ShortcutToEarth
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a short to earth on the speaker line. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: SlaveComInterface
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a failure on the link to a Slave ESC unit. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: SlaveErrorsAvailable
data.value: Action: check slave unit for more details on the found error(s)

data.name: SlaveSpdif1
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a failure on the link to a Slave ESC unit. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: SlaveSpdif2
data.value: Action: make sure no construction took place or wiring changes have been made in the building which could have caused a failure on the link to a Slave ESC unit. Reset the error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.

data.name: SparePower48V
data.value: Action: the Entero ESC detected a 48Vdc power loss. Check if all connections are ok and if other devices do not indicate 48Vdc errors. Reset error; Acknowledge the error if it returns and contact your dealer.
